Title: Provides for the establishment of life long learning centers within the state university to provide courses to persons 40 or older seeking to explore life options
Summary: Provides for the establishment of life long learning centers within the state university of New York to provide courses in community colleges and colleges and universities in the state university system for persons 40 years old or older who are seeking to explore life options, remain civically engaged, continue their education and acquire skills for or begin to plan for a second career.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing life long learning centers in the state university of New York
